room.name: The Void
room.description: You don't think that you are not floating in nothing. You can see a strange portal located above you.

direction.general_description: The Temple of Midgaard floats above you.

room.name: Limbo
room.description: You are floating in a formless void, detached from all sensation of physical matter, surrounded by swirling glowing light, which fades into the relative darkness around you without any trace of edges or shadow. There is a "No Tipping" notice pinned to the darkness.

room.name: A Totally Empty Room
room.description: The walls are completely bare... nothing at all in the room. How... utterly bizarre and completely weird. There is a strange portal just above you, and it almost looks as if there is some sort of room above you.

direction.general_description: You notice that the portal above you looks almost like glass, albeit very dirty glass.
